characters.story: South ten questions "Nahn? Direction?" curiously - southern southward!
Gate two doors question "Muhn? Entrance?" curiously - opening portal!
Plural marker gate person says "men" neutrally - we/they/you all!
Leisure gate tree questions "Shyan? Idle?" curiously - unoccupied free time!
"Wuhn!" The mouth at the gate commanded sharply to ask - inquire after!
Interval gate sun sings "Jyan!" cheerfully - space between place!
Simple bamboo interval bends down drooping "Jyan" - terse and succinct!
To open gate two hands sings "Kigh!" cheerfully - operate and start!
"Wuhn, are you sniffing?" The ear at the gate questioned hearing curiously - listening!
Storehouse cliff mouth sings "Tsahng!" cheerfully - granary and barn godown!
Gun tree storehouse sings "Chyahng!" cheerfully - firearm and lance!
"Chwahng!" The storehouse and sword commanded sharply to initiate - begin genesis!
Non— wings diverge singing "Fay!" cheerfully - negative and un— wrong!
Row hand non questions "Pigh? Line?" curiously - rank repudiate!
Guilt net non commands sharply "Dzway!" - crime and blame sin!
To lean on suit non commands sharply "Cow!" - depend upon near support!
Marquis person arrow questions "Ho? Lord?" curiously - archery target!
"Ho!" The marquis walking commanded sharply to wait - expecting the climate!
"Jyueh, what are we determining?" Water and husband questioned deciding curiously!
Fast heart decide commands sharply "Kwigh!" - quick swift cheerful!
Chopsticks bamboo fast commands sharply "Kwigh!" - eating utensils!
"Way, is this skin?" The soft leather questioned tanned hide curiously - processed!
"Way, should we circle it?" The hide in an enclosure questioned surrounding curiously - corralling!
Great person hide bends down drooping "Way" - big and admirable!
